metadata.subject: Lawyer for Susan Rice: Obama administration 'justifiably concerned' about sharing intel with Trump team - POLITICO

relationships.description: Sender forwarding a news article to recipient
Susan Rice was part of the Obama administration

analysis.purpose: To share a news article about Susan Rice's lawyer defending the Obama administration's handling of intelligence sharing with the Trump transition team
analysis.significance: Shows communication about political intelligence matters during the Trump transition period

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present

illegal_activity.description: This is an email forwarding a news article about political matters, not evidence of first-hand illegal activity by the sender

details: Forwarding a POLITICO news article about Susan Rice's lawyer defending Obama administration actions

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be sharing publicly available news coverage about the Trump transition and intelligence sharing controversies that were widely reported in 2017-2018

analysis.summary: Kathy Ruemmler forwards a POLITICO article to an email address about Susan Rice's lawyer defending the Obama administration's concerns regarding intelligence sharing with the Trump transition team, particularly referencing Michael Flynn.
